metadata.name: ¡Y TU!
metadata.description:
In January 2021, Asher started a Discord to help keep the creative spirit alive during the pandemic.  That same year he successfully created a project entirely produced by followers, fans and friends, called 'The Greenhouse Effect Vol. 3'.  It was a concept record about a fictitious school, The University of College, and its professor of Horticulture who was secretly growing special pot.  When smoked by the right person that pot opened a portal to the World of Abundance.

Last year, the collaborative efforts continued with 'Summer School' beat contests and subsequently 'Fall Semester' songwriting submissions.  This lil community of producers, songwriters and friends has proved to be invaluable to all those involved.

This genesis NFT invites you to take part in the World of Abundance as your collection unlocks the auditorium and other collaborative rooms at the UofC.
